com.skobbler.ngx.cache

Class SKTilesCacheManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.cache.SKTilesCacheManager

  • public final class SKTilesCacheManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles tiles cache management.
    Version:
    2.5

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAllCache()
      Deletes all cache.
      void deleteMapCacheOlderThan(long seconds)
      Deletes map tiles older than a certain time, releasing disk space.

      Gets the local tile cache size.

      Creates a single instance of SKTilesCacheManager

        public void setCacheSizeLimit(long bytesLimit)
        Sets the cache limit.
        Parameters:

        public long getCacheSize()
        Gets the local tile cache size.

      • deleteMapCacheOlderThan

        public void deleteMapCacheOlderThan(long seconds)
        Deletes map tiles older than a certain time, releasing disk space.
        Parameters:
        seconds - time in number of seconds. Tiles older the seconds will be deleted.

      • deleteAllCache

        public void deleteAllCache()
        Deletes all cache.
